name: The Mystery of the Pelican Village
name_original: The Mystery of the Pelican Village
description:
This game is made for Senscape Adventurous Game Jam in 14 days by one person.

The Mystery of the Pelican Village is an Adventure game where you control the new Sheriff of the region who has lost his memory 2 years ago. And regaining it by coming across to familiar places.
